                 boolean[][] nulo,
                 boolean distanceEu)
        Construct a random chromosome of specified size and evaluate it.
        Parameters:
        K - Number of neighbors
        size - Size of the chromosome
        dMatrix - data matrix.
        datos - Reference to the training set
        real - Reference to the training set (real valued)
        nominal - Reference to the training set (nominal valued)
        nulo - Reference to the training set (null values)
        distanceEu - True= Euclidean distance; False= HVDM

        Parameters:
        K - Number of neighbors
        a - first father
        b - second father.
        pCross - crossover probability
        size - Chromosome size.

        public int obtenerCercano(int[] vecinos,
                          int J,
                          double[][] dMatrix,
                          int index,
                          double[][] datos,
                          double[][] real,
                          int[][] nominal,
                          boolean[][] nulo,
                          boolean distanceEu)
        Obtains the nearest neighbour given a mask (chromosome)
        Parameters:
        vecinos - the nearest neighbour
        J - chromosome size.
        dMatrix - data matrix.
        index - example index.
        datos - Reference to the training set
        real - Reference to the training set (real valued)
        nominal - Reference to the training set (nominal valued)
        nulo - Reference to the training set (null values)
        distanceEu - True= Euclidean distance; False= HVDM
        Returns:
        minimum position of the nearest neighbour of the vector of neighbours

        public double optimizacionLocal(int nClases,
                                int K,
                                int[] clases,
                                double[][] dMatrix,
                                double umbral,
                                double[][] datos,
                                double[][] real,
                                int[][] nominal,
                                boolean[][] nulo,
                                boolean distanceEu)
        Local optimization for the chromosome as Memetic algorithm
        Parameters:
        nClases - number of classes
        K - Number of neighbors
        clases - Output attribute of each instance
        dMatrix - data matrix.
        umbral - Threshold. * @param vecinos the nearest neighbours
        datos - Reference to the training set
        real - Reference to the training set (real valued)
        nominal - Reference to the training set (nominal valued)
        nulo - Reference to the training set (null values)
        distanceEu - True= Euclidean distance; False= HVDM
        Returns:
        number of evaluations

        datos - Reference to the training set
        real - Reference to the training set (real valued)
        nominal - Reference to the training set (nominal valued)
